sourcesContent:
import "./App.css"; import { useState } from "react"; import { Title } from "./components/title/Title"; function App() { const [display, setDisplay] = useState(""); const [expression, setExpression] = useState([]); const handleClick = (value) => { setDisplay(value); setExpression([...expression, value]); }; const handleResult = () => { const result = expression .join("") .split(/(\D)/g) .map(value => (value.match(/\d/g) ? parseInt(value, 0) : value)) .reduce((acc, value, index, array) => { switch (value) { case "+": return (acc = acc + array[index + 1]); case "-": return (acc = acc - array[index + 1]); case "x": return (acc = acc * array[index + 1]); case "รท": return (acc = acc / array[index + 1]); default: return acc; } }); setDisplay(result); setExpression(""); }; return (
<div className="bg-primary h-auto w-1/5 border rounded-xl px-8 py-20"> <h1 className="text-white font-bold text-3xl mb-4">{expression}</h1> <div className="mb-4"> <input type="text" className="text-white bg-transparent" value={display} onChange={(e) => setDisplay(e.target.value)} /> </div> <hr className="border border-x border-stone-50 mb-4" /> <div className="flex"> <div className="flex flex-col justify-between items-center pt-4"> <button className="bg-secondary py-2 px-3 mx-1 border-0 rounded-md text-white text-lg" onClick={() => handleClick("")} > AC </button> <button className="text-white text-2xl" onClick={() => handleClick(7)} > 7 </button> <button className="text-white text-2xl" onClick={() => handleClick(4)} > 4 </button> <button className="text-white text-2xl" onClick={() => handleClick(1)} > 1 </button> <button className="text-white text-2xl" onClick={() => handleClick(0)} > 0 </button> </div> <div className="flex flex-col justify-between items-center pt-4"> <button className="bg-secondary py-2 px-3 mx-1 border-0 rounded-md text-white text-lg"> +/- </button> <button className="text-white text-2xl" onClick={() => handleClick(8)} > 8 </button> <button className="text-white text-2xl" onClick={() => handleClick(5)} > 5 </button> <button className="text-white text-2xl" onClick={() => handleClick(2)} > 2 </button> <button className="text-white text-2xl" onClick={() => handleClick(".")} > . </button> </div> <div className="flex flex-col justify-between items-center pt-4"> <button className="bg-secondary py-2 px-3 mx-1 border-0 rounded-md text-white text-lg" onClick={() => handleClick("%")} > % </button> <button className="text-white text-2xl" onClick={() => handleClick(9)} > 9 </button> <button className="text-white text-2xl" onClick={() => handleClick(6)} > 6 </button> <button className="text-white text-2xl" onClick={() => handleClick(3)} > 3 </button> <button className="text-white text-2xl" onClick={() => handleClick("00")} > 00 </button> </div> <div className="flex flex-col justify-between items-center pt-4"> <button className="bg-secondary py-2 px-4 border-0 rounded-md text-white text-2xl mb-2" onClick={() => handleClick("/")} > / </button> <button className="bg-secondary py-1 px-4 border-0 rounded-md text-white text-2xl mb-2" onClick={() => handleClick("*")} > x </button> <button className="bg-secondary py-1 px-4 border-0 rounded-md text-white text-2xl mb-2" onClick={() => handleClick("+")} > + </button> <button className="bg-secondary py-1 px-4 border-0 rounded-md text-white text-2xl mb-2" onClick={() => handleClick("-")} > - </button> <button className="bg-tertiary py-1 px-4 border-0 rounded-md text-white text-2xl mb-2" onClick={()=>handleResult()}> = </button> </div> </div> </div> </div> </div> ); } export default App;
